LHMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 123 Senior Resident Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Jul 28, 2025, 16:14 IST
 Lady Hardinge Medical College
 123 Jobs |  Posted On : 28-Jul-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 67,700 to 208,700




FOLLOW

The Lady Hardinge Medical College (LHMC) has officially released the notification to fill 123 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their BDS, Diploma, Post-graduation, MBBS, MDS, DNB, and Post-graduation can apply for the LHMC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

LHMC Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Senior Resident	123	BDS, MDS, MBBS, DNB, Post-graduation, Diploma

LHMC Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For OBC candidates: 03 Years.
For SC/St candidates: 05 Years.
For PWD candidates: 10 Years.

LHMC Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

LHMC Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

LHMC Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 67,700/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 2,08,700/- per month.
How to Apply for the LHMC Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the LHMC Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the filled application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Carry all the required documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

MEW Hall SJ Auditorium, LHMC.

Important Dates:

Starting date	28-07-2025
Closing date	13-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
